projects.title: Creator Verse
projects.subtitle: list your favorite creators
projects.description: Creatorverse is a dynamic front end project built to showcase and manage a collection of your favorite content creators, including YouTube channels, Instagram personalities, TikTok accounts, and more. This app allows users to create, read, update, and delete (CRUD) content creators

projects.title: Swiftie Meter
projects.subtitle: how swiftie are you?
projects.description: Discover how much of a Taylor Swift fan you are with the Swiftie Meter! This interactive tool analyzes your music preferences and social media to rate your Swiftie level.

projects.title: Caption AI
projects.subtitle: need a caption for your instagram post?
projects.description: Struggle no more for the perfect Instagram caption! Caption AI uses advanced machine learning to generate creative and engaging captions for your photos.

projects.title: AstroGen AI
projects.subtitle: check out what is happening for sign?
projects.description: Curious about your astrological future? AstroGen AI provides daily horoscope predictions powered by AI, tailored specifically to your zodiac sign.

projects.title: Cafe Checkout System
projects.subtitle: let me help your business checkout!
projects.description: Enhance your cafe's efficiency with our Cafe Checkout System. This tool simplifies the ordering and billing process, ensuring a smooth operation and improved customer satisfaction.
